title: VALLEY TRANSFER all-caps
content:
Hi folks...hope you’re able to help me out with this one. As with my last request, not sure if this is an actual font, or a custom redraw of an existing font. If it is, in fact, custom, what was the original font that was modified?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105639im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wtf_3965.jpg)

Any and all help is appreciated!
author: iskippy227

comments.content:
Oddly enough, it’s called Slag Wound from the Fontry. One of my personal favorites...

[http://www.thefontry.com/racepak1b](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105639/http:/www.thefontry.com/racepak1b)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105639/http:/www.thefontry.com/)
